name: Among the KEY! (BETA 1.0)
description:
Welcome to the Game page of Among the KEY!

In this game, you will be playing as a BOX. Flashback  in the first game you were still a human you destroyed Dr. Cray facility and now he is mad at you and turned you to a box.

Game is still in development 

Version : Beta 1.1
